metadata.title: SHEBA: Sea Ice Analysis Chukchi Sea (GIF)

creators.name: UCAR, Joint Office for Science Support (JOSS), Joint Office for Science Support

metadata.description: Sea Ice analysis for the Chukchi Sea west of Alaska.  Data provided by the National Ice Center based on satellite and surface reports.  Map provided once per day at 1200 UTC but updated only every 10-14 days.  NOAAServer Codes: [POL 80 65 -130 -170] .
